about_the_game:
Galactic Starfire: Squadron is a First-Person And Third-Person Space Shooter game set in a Future Sci-Fi themed universe. Play single-player and survive the challenges.

In Galactic Starfire: Squadron you will take on different challenges and try to stay alive as long as possible as you take to the cosmos, and other future sci-fi landscapes to survive the Galactic Battle. Galactic Starfire: Squadron is a First Person and Third Person Future Sci-Fi Space Shooter game where you will face various obstacles and gain score by eliminating opponents as you try to get the win. As the game progresses you will collect need to collect items, complete challenges, face enemy spaceships and try to stay alive as the space shooter levels progress and you try to win.

Galactic Starfire: Squadron is played as a single-player pve against enemies. Be the best in the and complete the challenges and levels the fastest. Train your skills in Galactic Starfire: Squadron to get better at the game.

name: Galactic Starfire: Squadron
short_description: Galactic Starfire: Squadron is a Future Sci-Fi Space Shooter game set in different environments around the universe. Complete the challenges and stay alive as you progress through the different types of levels.
